name: My page, my posts, don't like? It's free to FUCK OFF.

name: Timothty 2:12
value: I do not permit a woman to teach or to assume authority over a man; she must be quiet.

name: Al-Muwatta 30:13
value: 'I have a slave-girl and I used to have intercourse with her; Umar told him to beat his wife and to go to his slave-girl because kinship by suckling was only by the suckling of the young.

name: we = chinese = me
value: I predict another 2, at most 3 more generations before we stop the superstition of burning offerings and adding to pollution problems
